Purge.ReplyToPurge.id: Balas sebuah pesan untuk menentukan titik akhir purge.
Purge.ReplyToPurge.en: Reply to a message to specify the purge endpoint.

Purge.PurgeDescription.id: Purge akan menghapus pesan berdasarkan User ID pada rentang diatas.
Purge.PurgeDescription.en: Purge will delete messages based on User ID in the range above.

Purge.PurgeAnyDescription.id: Purge Any akan menghapus pesan siapapun pada rentang pesan awal sampai pesan akhir.
Purge.PurgeAnyDescription.en: Purge Any will delete any message in the range start message to end message..

Purge.ConfirmationMessage.id: Apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus pesan ini?
Purge.ConfirmationMessage.en: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

Purge.MaxDateExceed.id: Maaf, saat ini purge dibatasi 3 hari terakhir.
Purge.MaxDateExceed.en: Sorry, purge is currently limited to 3 days ago.
